title: Best of The Herd: 12/14/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/14/2018
description:
After the Chargers beat the Chiefs Colin points out that the win was an example of substance over style between Phillip Rivers and Patrick Mahomes. He defends Andy Reid even after the loss and says that if you think Andy Reid can't coach then you know nothing about football. Plus, former pro bowl LB Derrick Johnson talks with Colin about facing Phillip Rivers and why he isn't surprised at how good his former teammate Patrick Mahomes is.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
